items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
11% increased Attack Speed
+58 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Cataclysm Ornament
explicitMods: 1% chance to receive additional Unique items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
Heist Chests have a 4% chance to Duplicate contained Basic Currency
10% increased Quantity of Items dropped in Heists
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this

items.typeLine: Cremating Harbinger Bow of the Apt
explicitMods: 32% reduced Attribute Requirements
Adds 162 to 318 Fire Damage

properties.name: Support, Hex, Spell, AoE, Chaos, Trigger

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports hex curse skills, causing them to trigger Doom Blast when the hex ends. Cannot support curse skills which are triggered or applied as an aura.
explicitMods: Trigger Doom Blast when a Hex from Supported Curse Skills ends
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Deals 1265 to 1898 Chaos Damage
Trigger This Skill when a Hex from Supported Skills ends
hybrid.secDescrText: Deals chaos damage in an area.
